summary: Cluster machine creation blocked, action required
description: Action Required: Your cluster is unable to create a machine with type '${INVALID_MACHINE_TYPE}' due to ${REASON}. Please ${REMEDIATION} in order to restore your cluster to full functionality. For more information on machines, refer to: https://docs.redhat.com/rosa/rosa_cluster_admin/rosa_nodes/rosa-managing-worker-nodes.html.
